N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 621.5 - Eligible capital costs for a State aid grant

State Regulations
(a) Capital costs eligible for State aid
shall only include costs incurred by the applicant. (b) The amount of capital costs eligible for

State aid shall be determined by the commissioner. The value of a site shall be
established by an independent appraisal by OPWDD, its agents, or contractors. Capital costs eligible for State aid may include: (1)
acquisition of real property; (2)
design, including architectural and
engineering services; (3)
construction; (4)
reconstruction; (5)
rehabilitation
and improvement; (6)
original
furnishings and equipment; (7)
site
development; and
(8)
appurtenances. Notes
